title: No More Pets
description: No More Pets, remains a favourite with children 2-6.EntertainingIn this jump up and down, twirl around, beg for one more pet kind of book, your child will be entertained by Mariah's antics to win her Mom's approval to get one more pet.Mariah will promise her mom anything if it means she can have a puppy! The work grows with every pet she and her Mom add to their home.Will Mariah remember her promises?ValuesIn the end, Mariah learns a valuable lesson about keeping promises and that caring for pets is a family responsibility. It can also be a lot of work.Easy ReaderThe repeative text throughout the story is beneficial for your child to develop early reading skills.
author: Linda Sachs
